The Beginning of Legend: Guiding the Jiangshan Group 106958350

World Overview
No level, no profession, all equipment and skills are available for use. With complete freedom in equipment and skill matching, you can freely create your own genre!

150+pieces of equipment with multiple equipment attributes
60+Skills
100 Monsters

Having a relatively complete equipment strengthening system and multiple equipment strengthening methods
Having a relatively complete task system
Having a relatively complete exchange system
Having a relatively complete recycling system
Having a relatively complete rune system

Other systems and more content are still under production.
Your support is the biggest motivation for me to update. If you like it, please join the wish list and let me see it. Please!
